User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user in the EduConnect Pro application. Could be a teacher or student.

id.description: Unique identifier for the user, typically the Firebase Auth UID.

role.description: The role of the user (tutor, student, admin).

name.description: The full name of the user.

fatherName.description: The full name of the student's father.

status.description: The verification status of the user.

coachingName.description: The name of the teacher's coaching center or institute.

whatsappNumber.description: The teacher's WhatsApp number for student communication.

subjects.description: A list of subjects the teacher specializes in.

experience.description: The teacher's years of teaching experience.

fee.description: The teacher's fee structure (e.g., '500/month per subject').

discount.description: Details about available discounts for classes or students.

PublicTutor.title: PublicTutor
PublicTutor.description: Publicly visible information for an approved tutor.

Class.title: Class
Class.description: Represents a class created by a teacher.

teacherId.description: The ID of the teacher who created the class.

teacherName.description: The name of the teacher who created the class.

title.description: The title of the class, e.g. 'Math Class 8'

batchTime.description: The timing of the class batch, e.g. '10:00 AM - 11:30 AM'.

fee.description: The monthly fee for this class.

classCode.description: A unique, shareable code for students to join the class.

Enrollment.title: Enrollment
Enrollment.description: Represents a student's enrollment request for a specific class.

studentName.description: The name of the student. Denormalized for performance.

mobileNumber.description: The student's mobile number. Denormalized for display.

classId.description: The ID of the class the student is in.

teacherId.description: The ID of the teacher who owns the class. Denormalized for security rules.

classTitle.description: The title of the class. Denormalized for display.

classSubject.description: The subject of the class. Denormalized for display.

teacherName.description: The name of the teacher. Denormalized for display.

batchTime.description: The timing of the class batch. Denormalized for display.

paymentStatus.description: Fee payment status for this enrollment.

status.description: The status of the enrollment request (pending, approved, or denied).

StudyMaterial.title: Study Material
StudyMaterial.description: Represents a study material resource uploaded by a teacher or admin.

teacherId.description: The ID of the teacher who uploaded the material. Can be an admin ID.

teacherName.description: The name of the teacher who uploaded the material. Denormalized for display.

classId.description: The ID of the class this material belongs to. Null if not class-specific.

className.description: The name of the class this material belongs to. Denormalized for display.

fileUrl.description: URL to the file in Firebase Storage.

Attendance.title: Attendance
Attendance.description: Represents a daily attendance record for a specific class.

records.description: A map of student UIDs to their attendance status (true for present, false for absent).

Test.title: Test
Test.description: Represents a test created by a teacher.

TestResult.title: Test Result
TestResult.description: Stores a student's result for a specific test, including their answers.

studentName.description: The name of the student who took the test. Denormalized for display.

testTitle.description: The title of the test. Denormalized for display.

testSubject.description: The subject of the test. Denormalized for display.

answers.description: An array containing the student's answer for each question.

/users/{userId}.description: Stores all user profiles (students, tutors, admins).

/classes/{classId}.description: Stores all classes created by teachers.

/studyMaterials/{materialId}.description: All study materials for all classes.

/attendance/{attendanceId}.description: Stores daily attendance records for classes.

/tests/{testId}.description: Stores all tests created by teachers.
